member.name: D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION
member.summary: Specifies how to access a resource that is used in a video processor output view.

member.name: D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION.D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture.

member.name: D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION.D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures.
